QuestData.Title: The Debt We Share
QuestData.Description: These mortal shells that we call bodies are not ours to keep. The body is a gift of earth that must one day be returned from whence it came.$b$bThe time has come for this body to return to the elements.$b$bKnow that you have lifted the weight from an old heart, $n. As I pass on from this realm, I do so without regret. I have fought on behalf of my people and my land, I have served the elements, and I have loved.$b$bIt would honor me if you would stay during these final moments, $c.
QuestData.RewardText: Gar'rok was a loyal keeper and a true friend. He will be missed, but so is the cycle of life on this world.$b$bIn time we will call a new keeper of the elements, and he will serve us as Gar'rok did before him.
